review_title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
It is compatible with the Mi TV 4A
review_text:
Design and Build QualityThe remote has a sleek and minimalistic design, which is quite ergonomic and fits comfortably in the hand. The buttons are well-spaced and responsive, making it easy to navigate through different functions without accidentally pressing the wrong button. The build quality feels sturdy and durable, which is great for daily use.PerformanceThis remote pairs seamlessly with the Mi TV 4A, and the setup was straightforward. It‚Äôs a significant upgrade that enhances the user experience.FunctionalityThe remote comes with essential buttons for quick access, including volume control.Battery LifeBattery life has been quite satisfactory. Even with regular use, the batteries last for a considerable amount of time before needing replacement, which is a major plus point.ConclusionOverall, the Mi TV Remote is an excellent accessory for the Mi TV 4A. It complements the TV well with its efficient performance and user-friendly features. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their Mi TV experience.

review_title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Perfect choice for your original remote
review_text:
I recently purchased the ZdalaMit Mi TV Remote as a replacement for my original Xiaomi TV remote, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier! This remote has exceeded my expectations in terms of quality, functionality, and ease of use.Right out of the box, I was impressed with the remote's solid build and sleek, minimalist design that feels durable and comfortable to hold. Setting it up was a breeze‚Äîjust pop in the batteries, and it worked instantly with my Mi TV without any programming needed. The response time is incredibly fast, and the buttons are smooth and very responsive.The remote replicates all the essential functions of the original, so I didn‚Äôt have to sacrifice any features. Navigation buttons, volume control, and even shortcut keys to popular streaming apps work seamlessly. I also appreciate that it offers reliable connectivity from a good distance, allowing me to control the TV from anywhere in the room.Overall, the ZdalaMit Mi TV Remote is a fantastic, affordable replacement or backup remote. It has made my TV experience so much easier, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality Mi TV remote.

Like many others, I bought this remote because one of the buttons started failing on the original remote.  Specifically the right move on the circular button. To be honest I was skeptical  at first but I read through the review and saw many others giving it a decent review. Works just like the original. If you are having by trouble getting Bixby to work you need to resync the remote by holding the back button and the play/pause button for about three seconds. Someone mentioned that in a review and it worked for me.  So props to that reviewer!! Feels like the original and looks like the original. Only difference is the Samsung logo is not on the remote. If you want a replacement remote for your Samsung tv this is the way to go for sure!!! Happy channel surfing!!! üèÑ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è üì∫

review_title: My 80yr old mother loves it... enough said!
review_text:
My 80yr old mother has a Samsung TV and eventually wore out the remote that came with it.  She came to really like the old remote.  I purchased another replacement remote for her TV and although it worked, she was not happy with it.  This remote she said was very easy to control for her.  On behalf of a grateful son, I can't recommend this enough!  BTW, I did the setup on this and the manufactures instructions on how to PAIR it were right on and it worked great!

review_title: So far it is just as good as the original
review_text:
I lost my original Samsung remote and bought this as a replacement. The price was great. The volume buttons look different. The rest looks the same. I did read some reviews about voice not working. My original did not have voice, and I am not looking for voice. The device ergonomics mimic the original (feel and operation).
